Title: My Neighbor Totoro
Summary: Two young sisters move to the countryside and encounter magical creatures.

Title: Spirited Away
Summary: A young girl gets trapped in a mysterious and magical world.

Title: Akira
Summary: In a dystopian future, a biker gang member gains psychic abilities.

Title: Ghost in the Shell
Summary: Cybernetic agents investigate cybercrime in a futuristic city.

Title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
Summary: Teenagers pilot giant mechs to protect Earth from mysterious beings.

Title: Princess Mononoke
Summary: A young warrior seeks to restore balance between humans and nature.

Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Summary: Bounty hunters chase a terrorist across the galaxy.

Title: Perfect Blue
Summary: A former pop idol faces psychological horror after leaving her group.

Title: Paprika
Summary: A device allows therapists to enter patients' dreams, leading to chaos.

Title: Grave of the Fireflies
Summary: Two siblings struggle to survive during World War II.
